alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lincoln and northwestern Pottawatomie Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McLoud, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McLoud and Dale. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 174 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
